oai_dc:dc.dc:title: An approximation algorithm for finding long paths in Hamiltonian graphs
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: VISHWANATHAN, S
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this paper we present a polynomial-time algorithm that finds paths of length Omega((log n/ log log n)(2)) in undirected Hamiltonian graphs, improving the previous best of Omega(log n). (C) 2003 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: 11th Annual ACM/SIAM Symposium on Discrete Algorithms,SAN FRANCISCO, CALIFORNIA,JAN 09-11, 2000
